news.title: MNNIT Allahabad Celebrates Alumni Meet
news.content: The CSE department at MNNIT Allahabad recently hosted an alumni meet. Alumni from various batches attended the event, sharing their experiences and discussing future collaborations.
news.author: Admin

news.title: New Research Lab Inaugurated at MNNIT
news.content: A new research lab focusing on artificial intelligence and machine learning was inaugurated at MNNIT Allahabad. The lab is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities to support cutting-edge research.
news.author: Dr. A. Kumar

news.title: MNNIT Hosts International Tech Conference
news.content: MNNIT Allahabad hosted an international tech conference, bringing together experts from around the world to discuss the latest trends and innovations in technology.
news.author: Tech Desk

news.title: Alumni Start-up Success Stories
news.content: Several MNNIT alumni have successfully launched their own start-ups. This article highlights their journeys, challenges, and achievements.
news.author: Startup Desk

news.title: CSE Department Ranked Top in India
news.content: The Computer Science and Engineering department at MNNIT Allahabad has been ranked as the top department in India according to a recent survey.
news.author: Education Board
